be unpacked, the selected splash (.jpg) will
be copied into the unpacked recovery image,

If the option "Include theme" is selected,
the theme (only the current color) will also
be copied into the unpacked recovery image,
The recovery will then be repacked to
and saved to the same folder as the
If the option "automatically install..." is selected,
the repacked image will directly be flashed

The script will then search for a partition

the script will not flash anything.

If your device uses other partition names
the script will let you know and stop.
Be certain the image you have selected also
has the correct type selected. Do not
attempt to flash an image to the incorrect
partition and then reboot, or you may need
